oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-01-31 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 31, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer), guest performer Justin Tubb, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1008th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Justin Tubb; Del Wood; Porter Wagoner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Porter Wagoner introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Porter Wagoner) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Porter Wagoner introduces Justin Tubb -- Almost Lonely (Justin Tubb) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Del Wood -- Whirl-A-Way (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Porter Wagoner announce his tour schedule -- Out Of Sight Out Of Mind (Porter Wagoner) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Porter Wagoner) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Minnie Pearl; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Stoker, Gordon, 1924-2013; Wagoner, Porter; Tubb, Justin
